verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: slow] - [V: cooked] [ARG1: blueberry french toast] your slow cooker can be your best friend on a busy morning just get this recipe going run some errands and come back to the smell of french toast ready to eat —elizabeth lorenz peru indiana cook
